Sentencas: The main aim of the presented research is to study the effect of subcooling the condenser outlet refrigerant in a compression-absorption cascade refrigeration system via energy and exergy methods.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of subcooling the condenser outlet refrigerant in a compression-absorption cascade refrigeration system

Sentencas: A parametric study is also conducted to investigate the effects of the operating conditions.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of subcooling the condenser outlet refrigerant in a compression-absorption cascade refrigeration system

Sentencas: LiBr-H2O and H2O-NH3 are used as fluid pairs in absorption section.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of subcooling the condenser outlet refrigerant in a compression-absorption cascade refrigeration system

Sentencas: The system is powered up by a prime mover, which can be either a micro-gas turbine, a gas turbine or a solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of subcooling the condenser outlet refrigerant in a compression-absorption cascade refrigeration system

Sentencas: The waste heat from the prime mover operates the absorption chiller and provides additional cooling, which is used to subcool the liquid exiting the condenser of the compression chiller.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of subcooling the condenser outlet refrigerant in a compression-absorption cascade refrigeration system

Sentencas: Results indicate that subcooling the condenser outlet enhances the efficiency of the cycle.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of subcooling the condenser outlet refrigerant in a compression-absorption cascade refrigeration system

Sentencas: It is also concluded that the system with a H2O-NH3 chiller has a better overall efficiency than the system with a LiBr-H2O chiller.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of subcooling the condenser outlet refrigerant in a compression-absorption cascade refrigeration system
